Text:
Quite good CAM, unfortunately without english subtitles when the chinese people are speaking.

V=6
A=4

This is ok the sound is not bad video blurry in a few spots but generally ok.But its hard at first to get the gist of the storyline as they speaking in Chinese with no subs.But that really just ads to the suspense actually as you think something else until later when they speak in English.A lot is in Chinese so beware you wont understand 30% of the movie.
^^ Disregard those, the subs are hirrible
